title: AML Graph Typology Library: Parameterised Patterns for Testing
summary: A reusable library of parameterised AML typologies for synthetic graph generation and testing.
bodyMd:
## Typologies
- Smurfing (window/threshold)
- Mule fan‑out (degree, reuse)
- Cash‑out rings (timing, hub degree)
- Daisy chains (hop count, time lag)

## Use
Generate test graphs and evaluate rule/models; export evidence for audit.
